dadadvices: Learn how to change your tires.
Dont let them see you weak.
Take things one step at a time and everything else will fall into place.
We're the average of the people we spend time with.
Your name is all you have, so protect it.
You'll be happier professionally if you love life.
Every stranger can teach you something.
Be grateful and humble in whatever role you play.
Learn to sell what you love.
Leave your mark with the awesome sauce.
